definition: along the sides of the road/by the wayside
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge

sentences.english: Carrie had noticed the appearance of gayety and pleasure-seeking in the streets which they were following.
sentences.chinese: 嘉莉注意到沿途那喜庆热闹和寻欢作乐的景象。

sentences.english: A road trip into the country can be a leisurely drive that lets you enjoy the scenic view.
sentences.chinese: 去郊外的自驾游就从容到能让你饱览沿途风光了。

sentences.english: The fire builds, devouring everything in its path.
sentences.chinese: 凶猛的大火将沿途上的一切都吞噬。

sentences.english: Somewhere along the way I lost my umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 我把雨伞丢失在沿途某处了。

sentences.english: Finally, it contrasted characters of residences in different villages and towns along Xianxia ancient road.
sentences.chinese: 最后对比研究了仙霞古道沿途村镇的住宅特点。

sentences.english: If you arenwoult busy tonight- would you like to go out with me?
sentences.chinese: 要是你今晚有空的话，愿不愿意和我沿途进来？
沿途把冬日的道路撒满。

sentences.english: On the flourishing land, we turn the tears we had on the way into the treasure-trove.
sentences.chinese: 在繁华的岸上，把沿途的泪光，都埋成了宝藏。

sentences.english: It has spectacular views along the line , with unique ethnic customs.
sentences.chinese: 沿途景色壮观秀丽，具有浓厚，独特的民族风情。

sentences.english: Along the road into the city from the airport, many areas were deserted.
sentences.chinese: 从机场入城的沿途，许多地方已成废墟。

sentences.english: There are guides and wayside inns along the road.
sentences.chinese: 沿途都有向导和客店为我们预备着。

sentences.english: All along the way, people were standing by the road to show their respect.
sentences.chinese: 沿途每到一地，都有人站在路旁，表达他们的敬意。

sentences.english: During the collection and transportation of solid waste, it is a non-neglectable problem that the leachate from waste leaks or sprinklers along the road.
sentences.chinese: 在垃圾收运过程中，垃圾污水沿途洒漏问题不容忽视。

sentences.english: After a short stay, they again set out towards the north, making a rough chart of the shores they saw.
sentences.chinese: 稍作停留继续北上，对沿途的海岸绘制了简单的海图。

sentences.english: The river bank is the scenery accompanying me.

definition: along the way/the duration of a journey
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
to make a detour/to take the long route
along the river/the region around the river
